last_episode_to_air.name: Tomorrow
last_episode_to_air.overview: The squad works during a full moon. Suarez and Beatrice receive unexpected news. The squad works to prevent a tragedy.

overview: The day-to-day life of two unwilling partners of the Montreal Police Department, Officers Nick Barron and Ben Chartier. These two beat cops patrol the urban sprawl of downtown's 19th district, in cruiser No. 2. 19-2 is about the tensions and bonds that develop between two incompatible men of very different temperaments and life experiences. Over time, Nick and Ben's mistrust and antagonism for each other give way to moments of mutual respect and a wavering chance at a true partnership.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: In the first season, Nick, who has just returned from a three-month leave following the traumatic shooting of his partner, learns he has been partnered with Ben, who has just transferred from a small town to restart his life in the big city. Ben and Nick must attempt to put their differences aside as their lives further intertwine, both professionally and personally.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: In the second season, Ben is under pressure from the Sécurité du Québec (SQ) to uncover the identity of a mole at Station 19. He begins to secretly investigate his own squad, further complicating both his partnership with Nick, and their burgeoning friendship.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: In the third season, the fragmented squad is reeling from the revelation that Sergeant Julien Houle was a pedophile and a mole for organized crime. As Commander Gendron scrambles to save his own career, the patrollers strengthen their bond to help them through this shocking news. Meanwhile, Nick, still rocked by guilt over his involvement in a murder, seeks closure by trying to find out what happened to his missing cousin Kaz. Ben finds love and happiness with Nick’s sister, Amelie, but struggles with the family he thought he’d left behind.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: In the fourth and final season, the squad faces an eruption of events that force them together in the face of tragedy. It is a season of personal growth and professional trials with beat partners Ben Chartier and Nick Barron and the rest of the cops in 19 fighting corruption and seeking revenge.

tagline: Torn by life. Bound by the streets.

episodes.name: Partners
episodes.overview: Guilt ridden Officer Nick Barron returns to work following a deadly shooting; Ben Chartier's transfer to Station 19 from Québec's rural police force turns rocky after a split-second decision triggers an internal investigation.

episodes.name: Deer
episodes.overview: A showdown between rival street gangs goes terribly wrong, leaving Ben’s life in danger. Squad 19 gathers at Marie’s for the Sergeant’s party and Isabelle discovers Nick may have feelings for someone else.

episodes.name: Welfare Day
episodes.overview: The first of the month brings “Welfare Day” to 19 – Nick and Ben handle an array of belligerent civilians; the day caps off with a cataclysmic domestic disturbance.

episodes.name: The Party
episodes.overview: Tyler botches a takedown of a gang of rapists that nearly costs Nick his life, and leaves Ben to question Tyler's fitness on the job. Nick brings Harvey to Houle’s BBQ, which goes crudely awry.

episodes.name: Home
episodes.overview: Nick butts heads with J.M when they are assigned patrol together. Beatrice embarks on a new romance.

episodes.name: Turf
episodes.overview: A cover-up comes back to haunt Nick and Ben, pitting them against Gendron. Nick’s frustrations mount when Ben encroaches on his personal life.

episodes.name: Lovers
episodes.overview: Squad 19 is pulled into a big raid. Nick and Ben clash over a politically explosive DUI while Isabelle and Nick find common ground when Theo starts to act out.

episodes.name: Medals
episodes.overview: An amber alert ripples through 19. After realizing he’s been shutting Audrey out, Nick makes a strong commitment to her. Ben continues to date Amelie without telling Nick, adding another stress to their partnership.

episodes.name: Islands
episodes.overview: The squad is devastated when one of their own is brutally assaulted and left clinging to life, causing personal vendettas to collide with protocol in the aftermath.

episodes.name: Winter
episodes.overview: In the climactic season finale, Nick receives devastating news, and struggles to contain his explosive response. A surprise visitor lands in Ben's life, forcing him to make some very hard decisions.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: In the first season, Nick, who has just returned from a three-month leave following the traumatic shooting of his partner, learns he has been partnered with Ben, who has just transferred from a small town to restart his life in the big city. Ben and Nick must attempt to put their differences aside as their lives further intertwine, both professionally and personally.

episodes.name: School
episodes.overview: The entire squad is embroiled in an intensely tragic school shooting with consequences that will profoundly impact all of their lives.

episodes.name: Disorder
episodes.overview: In the aftermath of the school shooting, the squad copes with the trauma as it affects them in ways they never expected.

episodes.name: Borders
episodes.overview: After the arrest of a misunderstood homeless man and the retrieval of a runaway, Nick and Ben realize that not everyone can be saved.

episodes.name: Tribes
episodes.overview: The squad becomes involved in a feud with firemen; little mistakes cause consequences.

episodes.name: Rock Garden
episodes.overview: Amelie takes a chance on Ben, while Nick and Isabelle receive shocking news about Theo.

episodes.name: Tables
episodes.overview: The hunt for the mole takes a dramatic shift when Nick is pulled off patrol.

episodes.name: Property Line
episodes.overview: An accidental death leads violent protesters to occupy an abandoned building.

episodes.name: Babylon
episodes.overview: After an accidental death, violent protesters occupy an abandoned building and the squad must clear them out.

episodes.name: Orphans
episodes.overview: The identity of the mole is revealed.

episodes.name: Bridges
episodes.overview: With the mole on the run, a devastated squad turn on each other, and on themselves.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: In the second season, Ben is under pressure from the Sécurité du Québec (SQ) to uncover the identity of a mole at Station 19. He begins to secretly investigate his own squad, further complicating both his partnership with Nick, and their burgeoning friendship.

episodes.name: Burn Pile
episodes.overview: The squad waits for findings from a task force into Sergeant Houle’s case. Nick and Ben find themselves at the centre of the fractured squad, the only partnership that has endured. On the job, the squad face a horrific accident that puts multiple lives in danger.

episodes.name: Rescue
episodes.overview: Nick investigates his cousin's death and finds a possible witness.

episodes.name: Chicken
episodes.overview: When he tries to help Nick with his investigation, Ben gets in trouble with homicide.

episodes.name: Bitch
episodes.overview: A wannabe mobster has a tempting proposition for Nick.

episodes.name: Protest Pants
episodes.overview: The city cuts public sector pensions, pitting the squad against their own.

episodes.name: City
episodes.overview: Ben returns home to Morin Heights when his father goes missing. Nick and Martine make a deal.

episodes.name: Honeymoon
episodes.overview: The squad returns to normal duty. Nick keep secrets as he pursues his cousin's killer.

episodes.name: Fall
episodes.overview: Nick and Ben will be forever changed by a tragedy caused by a misunderstanding.

episodes.name: Gone
episodes.overview: Nick and Ben deal with the aftermath of a tragedy. Nick's lies threaten to drive them apart.

episodes.name: Water
episodes.overview: Nick and Ben discover the truth behind Amelia's death.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: In the third season, the fragmented squad is reeling from the revelation that Sergeant Julien Houle was a pedophile and a mole for organized crime. As Commander Gendron scrambles to save his own career, the patrollers strengthen their bond to help them through this shocking news. Meanwhile, Nick, still rocked by guilt over his involvement in a murder, seeks closure by trying to find out what happened to his missing cousin Kaz. Ben finds love and happiness with Nick’s sister, Amelie, but struggles with the family he thought he’d left behind.

episodes.name: Swimming
episodes.overview: Nick and Ben are set on taking down Inspector Elise Roberge in order to avenge the brutal murder of Nick's sister. Nick is first on the site of a horrific event with numerous casualties. Meanwhile, Ben and Audrey are implicated in a tragic accident.

episodes.name: Driveby
episodes.overview: With the investigation of Elise Roberge over, Ben volunteers for surveillance duty. Ben and Audrey face the consequences of their accident. The squad ends up in the middle of a growing gang war.

episodes.name: Fishbowl
episodes.overview: Ben's actions bring repercussions. Ben and Nick seek justice for a raped prostitute and encounter someone they both never thought they'd see again. A new officer joins 19. The squad finds out something disturbing about one of their own.

episodes.name: Labour Day
episodes.overview: The squad escapes to a cottage for the weekend, where alcohol and the intimate setting lead to conflict.

episodes.name: Flowers
episodes.overview: The patrollers of 19 struggle to find their footing. Nick realizes what he wants. Dulac loses control.

episodes.name: Sons
episodes.overview: Ben faces consequences. Nick's new romance gets complicated. Dulac crosses a line; Audrey thinks about the future.

episodes.name: Wake
episodes.overview: Ben's troubles become public, Nick faces a crisis and Dulac gets in over his head.

episodes.name: Tomorrow
episodes.overview: The squad works during a full moon. Suarez and Beatrice receive unexpected news. The squad works to prevent a tragedy.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: In the fourth and final season, the squad faces an eruption of events that force them together in the face of tragedy. It is a season of personal growth and professional trials with beat partners Ben Chartier and Nick Barron and the rest of the cops in 19 fighting corruption and seeking revenge.
